title: Skins/Themes for Solr UI
description:
Request the ability to create 'skins' or 'themes' for the UI.

Some people love designing themes, which will help recruit UI developers. Also, no color set can please everyone. And, a black&white theme makes for more readable screenshots in bug reports.

comments.author: Lance Norskog
comments.content:
How to choose the theme:

	Configuration file entry.
	
		There are no configuration files for the UI, and adding one would be a bad idea.
	
	
	There could be a drop-down to pick the theme, and maybe a cookie to preserve the decision.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Can we close this? Admin UI is not really for end-users, the focus is on functional rather than eye-candy.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: I'd rather see us spend the time & energy getting the new UI working really well before ever tackling this.
